long_description: As a flattering alternative to skintight workout gear, just toss the SkirtSports Sexy Back dress over your shorts and enjoy full mobility, comfortable coverage and a contoured A-line shape. Breathable polyester and spandex jersey fabric wicks away moisture and feels soft against skin. Built-in shelf bra provides light support and coverage; front pocket in bra stores gels or other small essentials. Racerback promotes unrestricted motion, and rear mesh fabric cools skin as you perspire; deep pocket in back of dress stores extra items. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light. The SkirtSports Sexy Back Dress is fitted through bust and core and semi-relaxed through the hips. Closeout.
short_description: As a flattering alternative to skintight workout gear, just toss the SkirtSports Sexy Back dress over your shorts and enjoy full mobility, comfortable coverage and a contoured A-line shape.
